Welcome to the RAG Platform

This is a sample document used for testing the text extraction pipeline.
It contains multiple paragraphs with varying content to ensure proper handling.

The platform supports hybrid search combining vector similarity and full-text
search using Reciprocal Rank Fusion (RRF) for optimal result ranking.

Key features include:
- Multi-tenant isolation via Row-Level Security
- Automatic text chunking with configurable overlap
- Support for multiple document formats
